alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Hughes; Hyde; Lyman; Stanley (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 03 at 9:27PM MDT until July 03 at 10:15PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Hyde County in central South Dakota... Southeastern Stanley County in central South Dakota... Southeastern Hughes County in central South Dakota... Northern Lyman County in central South Dakota... Northwestern Buffalo County in central South Dakota... * Until 1115 PM CDT. * At 1027 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Cedar Creek Rec Area, or 15 miles northwest of Lower Brule, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Joe Creek Rec Area around 1035 PM CDT. West Bend Rec Area around 1045 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Lower Brule. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
